description: The DSC segment is used in the continuation protocol.

1.name: Continuation Pointer
1.description: This field contains the continuation pointer. In an initial query, this field is not present. If the responder returns a value of null or not present, then there is no more data to fulfill any future continuation requests. Note that continuation protocols work with both display- and record-oriented messages.

2.name: Continuation Style
2.description:
Indicates whether this is a fragmented message, or if it is part of an interactive continuation message.

Refer to HL7 Table 0398 – Continuation Style Code for valid values.
2.data_type: ID - Coded values for HL7 tables
